summary: This bill, the High Occupancy Vehicle Lane Exemption Reauthorization Act, aims to amend Title 23 of the United States Code concerning HOV (High Occupancy Vehicle) facilities. It seeks to extend the authorization for alternative fuel and clean vehicles to use HOV lanes. Specifically, it amends Section 166(b)(5)(A) of title 23, replacing the expiration date of September 30, 2025, with September 30, 2031, effectively extending the program for six years.
